QuestData.Title: The Mark of the Nexus-King
QuestData.Description: What I must now know is what the Ethereum have held inside the Mana-Tombs of Auchindoun.$B$BIn your battles against the beasts of the stasis chambers of Bash'ir you may run across an item known as the Mark of the Nexus-King. Should you find such an item, return it to me immediately! It is the final piece in crafting a key that will allow access to the stasis chamber inside the Mana-Tombs.
QuestData.LogDescription: The Image of Commander Ameer at Bash'ir's Landing in the Blade's Edge Mountains wants you to bring him a Mark of the Nexus-King.
QuestData.CompletionText: This will be your most daunting task, $N.
QuestData.RewardText: At last!$B$B<Commander Ameer reads from the Mark of the Nexus-King.>$B$BTwo final prisons? I shudder to think what horrors lie in wait...
